author: dmitriishmatko
content:
Looks like you've cooked up wrong genesis.ssz
You should be sure you have the same configs when generating genesis.ssz with `eth2-testnet-genesis` (key --eth2-config) and when starting Teku (key --network). It's really a pain sometimes as ssz is not human-readable and doesn't contain a scheme. Check that you have the same config in both place. If you still have troubles, you'd better contact me in direct messages to not overburden channel
